mapper.select: SELECT a.no, a.i_no iNo, a.content, a.user_no userNo, a.regdate, u.nickname, u.profile_image profileImage FROM answers a, users u WHERE a.user_no = u.no AND a.i_no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO answers(no, i_no, content, user_no, regdate) VALUES (answers_seq.nextval, #{iNo}, #{content}, 9999, systimestamp)
